title: TimeShift
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Some tinkering required**. Use alternate executable: `./bin/TimeShift.exe`. Tested with Proton 9.0-4
description: Master time to become the ultimate weapon! Dr. Aiden Krone has made a Time Jump across the space-time continuum - a reckless act with frightening consequences.
